content.text: All necessary guards, protective structures and warning signs shall be used to protect both personnel and  cabling components.
Relevant local regulations for safe working practices shall be complied with.

If any measures have been made in the information technology cabling to prevent overvoltages exceeding  the defined values, installers and service personnel shall be made aware of how and where these measures  have been applied.
Installers and service personnel shall be made aware of safety warning signs that may be present on shared  infrastructures.
